data.message: Could you please update your help center so it has information on how to set your profile so that only your friends can see it? It currently does not have that information.

replies.message:
Hi Jacob. Please check out our Privacy section in the Help Center to learn how to manage your privacy settings. Have a great weekend! -Meagan 
https://www.facebook.com/help/325807937506242/

Again, it does not have the information I asked for as I already clearly stated. So please: update your help center so it has information on how to set your profile so that only your friends can see it.

Facebook I have it set so that only my friends should be able to view my posts & what is on my profile. I have done everything the help center says to do yet complete strangers can still view everything that is on my profile. Please tell me, I mean actually tell me, how do i set it so that complete strangers cannot view my timeline & my profile. Your help center does not currently contain this information.
